activities: Objective Management Group provides online sales assessment tools, sold through trusted distributors, and provided to clients to assess job applicants or evaluate existing employees. We collect personal information to identify the individuals being assessed, and only share that information with the client who purchased our services, and the distributor through whom that purchase was made. We also collect personal information via information request forms and email subscription signup forms on our website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Visitor data, Personal information submitted with questionnaires
recoursemech: EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
